channel.title: CVE Feed for uFactory -- xArm 5 Lite, xArm 6 and xArm 7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for uFactory -- xArm 5 Lite, xArm 6 and xArm 7

item.title: CVE-2020-10286|2024-08-04T10:58:40.025Z -- ufactory -- xarm%205%20lite%2C%20xarm%206%20and%20xarm%207
item.description: the main user account has restricted privileges but is in the sudoers group and there is not any mechanism in place to prevent sudo su or sudo -i to be run gaining unrestricted access to sensible files, encryption, or issue orders that disrupt robot operation.
